ISSUE.TITLE: Determine deployment type automatically
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: - package.json and dockerfile => docker - dockerfile => docker - package.json => npm - no meta file => static - item is a file, not a folder => static It will never prompt and just let the user define with "--docker", "--static" and "--npm" and to the remaining determination part (if no flag defined) automatically by itself.
